about_desc: Journey through the cosmos with Astral Tarot. Gain profound insights and guidance by exploring the celestial wisdom held within the cards. Your destiny awaits among the stars.
feature_1_desc: Navigate life's questions with insights drawn from the celestial patterns and ancient card wisdom.
feature_2_desc: Readings tailored to your unique energy and the cosmic map of your life's journey.
feature_3_desc: Unlock timeless secrets and connect with the universe's guiding energies, anytime, anywhere.
features_desc: Discover the unique features that make Astral Tarot your guide to the cosmos.
meta_description: Landing page for the Astral Tarot web app. Unveil the Stars and discover your cosmic destiny.
homepage_intro_title: Welcome to Your Journey Beyond the Stars
homepage_intro_desc: Explore the universe of possibilities with tarot readings. Our intuitive platform is designed to help you connect with the wisdom of the tarot, offering insight and clarity for life's questions.
homepage_howitworks_desc: Start your journey in just 6 simple steps. Our intuitive interface makes it easy to begin your tarot readings in seconds. Choose your category, select your spread, set your intention, draw your cards, review the overview, and unveil the secrets of the cosmos.
homepage_howitworks_step_6: Reach the culmination of your journey by receiving your personalized tarot interpretation and cosmic guidance.
homepage_spreads_desc: Discover some of the most loved and used tarot spreads by our community. Each spread is designed to offer unique perspectives on different aspects of life.
spread_singleCard_desc: Quick guidance with a single cardâ€”perfect for daily insights.
spread_pastPresentFuture_desc: Classic three-card spread to see your journey across time.
spread_celticCross_desc: The most comprehensive spread for deep, multi-faceted questions.
spread_mindBodySpirit_desc: A holistic look at your mind, body, and spirit.
spread_astroLogicalCross_desc: Explore your question through astrological themes.
spread_dreamInterpretation_desc: Uncover the symbolic meaning of your dreams.
spread_fullMoonSpread_desc: Illumination and completion with the energy of the full moon.
spread_problemSolution_desc: Identify the root of a problem and find guidance for resolution.
spread_fiveCardPath_desc: A five-step journey through your current situation.
spread_brokenHeart_desc: Healing and new beginnings after emotional pain.
spread_yearlySpread_desc: A card for each month and a summary for the year.
spread_horseshoeSpread_desc: A broad overview of your situation with seven cards.
spread_categoryReading_desc: A free-form spread for your own questions.
category_general_desc: Explore universal messages and overall life energy.
category_love_desc: Guidance for love, relationships, and emotional bonds.
category_career_desc: Insights for your career, work, and material opportunities.
category_spiritual_desc: Messages for spiritual growth, intuition, and inner journeys.
category_health_desc: Guidance for mind, body, and soul wellness.
category_custom_desc: Create your own spread for any question or intention.
_comment_homepage_sections: Homepage sections: intro, how it works, popular spreads, etc.
_comment_spread_keys: Spread explanations for homepage and reading steps.
_comment_category_keys: Category labels and descriptions for reading flow.
reading_category_insight_general: Explore universal messages and overall life energy.
reading_category_insight_love: Guidance for love, relationships, and emotional bonds.
reading_category_insight_career: Insights for your career, work, and material opportunities.
reading_category_insight_spiritual: Messages for spiritual growth, intuition, and inner journeys.
reading_category_insight_health: Guidance for mind, body, and soul wellness.
reading_category_insight_custom: A free space for your own questions and custom spreads.
reading_category_footer: Each category offers cosmic guidance for a different area of your life. Descriptions are always visible. Make your choice and discover the wisdom of the stars!
reading_choose_spread: Choose a spread for your reading.
reading_spread_info: Each spread offers a unique way to explore your question. Click the info icon for details.
reading_spread_info_modal: See the card positions and spread details here.
reading_cards_info: Click the button to draw your cards.
reading_step_desc_cards: Pick your cards and see the reading.
reading_category_info: Select a category to begin your tarot reading journey. Each category offers unique guidance for different areas of your life.
reading_cards_unveil_info: The cards will be revealed and arranged in their spread. Get ready to unveil your reading!
spread_pastPresentFuture_meaning_past: Influences from the past affecting your situation.
spread_pastPresentFuture_meaning_present: The current energy or challenge you are facing.
spread_pastPresentFuture_meaning_future: The likely outcome or direction if things continue as they are.
spread_problemSolution_meaning_advice: Guidance or advice for your situation.
spread_mindBodySpirit_meaning_mind: Your mental state, thoughts, and beliefs.
spread_mindBodySpirit_meaning_spirit: Your intuition, soul, and spiritual energy.
spread_dreamInterpretation_meaning_past: Past influences or origins of the dream.
spread_dreamInterpretation_meaning_prese: Current emotions or situations reflected in the dream.
spread_dreamInterpretation_meaning_futur: Potential outcomes or guidance from the dream.
spread_horseshoeSpread_meaning_3: What is likely to happen next.
spread_horseshoeSpread_meaning_5: How others or external factors affect you.
spread_yearlySpread_meaning_summary: Summary of the year's main themes.
reading_step_desc_overview: See your personalized tarot reading overview and interpretation.
reading_step_desc_result: See your personalized tarot reading result and interpretation.
intention_general_examples: What general energies await me in life?
What is the universe's message for me today?
intention_love_examples: What awaits me in my love life?
How will my relationship with X develop?
intention_career_examples: What should be my next step in my career?
intention_spiritual_examples: What spiritual lessons am I learning?
What is my inner guidance telling me?
intention_health_examples: What should I pay attention to for my health?
How can I maintain my mental and physical balance?
reading_step_desc_prompt: Set your intention or question for the reading.
prompt_step_desc: Before you draw the cards, set a clear intention or question.
prompt_step_motivation_1: Take a moment to focus your intention.
prompt_step_motivation_2: What is your heart truly seeking?
prompt_step_motivation_3: The clearer your question, the clearer the guidance.
reading_disclaimer: This reading is generated by AI and is for entertainment purposes only.
reading_timeout_error: Request timed out. Please try again.
reading_rate_limit_error: Too many requests. Please wait a moment.
reading_server_error: Server error. Please try again later.
reading_prompt_too_long: Prompt is too long or invalid (maximum {maxLength} characters).
pdf_error: An error occurred while generating PDF. Please try again.
pdf_disclaimer: This reading is generated by AI and is for entertainment purposes only.
